action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
Safe Equitable Campus Resources and Education Act of 2019
This bill addresses the needs of individuals with disabilities on college campuses, such as ensuring that their needs are included in emergency response and evacuation procedures and in responses to incidents of sexual assault, domestic violence, dating violence, and stalking.
